page.title: 13THE CARNIVAL,EARLS COLNE
page.content: We have a carnival every year in Earls Colne.This year it was on the 22nd June.We have carnival princesses and a queen.Anna Saward and Luisa Melon were princesses and Jane Archall was the queen.We have our carnival on the Earls Colne cricket meadow.We have a big tent where you can buy drinks,crisps and other things in there.There is a big wheel which is 30 pence a go.There are also other stalls like raffles and a roll a penny stall.In the parade there are quite a lot of floats.In the evening there is a carnival dance in the tent.On the 23rd June the day after the carnival the majorettes from Halstead, Coggeshall Colchester,Braintree and so on came to Earls Colne and did displays in the cricket meadow.
